text: Edward Ralph Dexter, (15 May 1935 â€“ 25 August 2021) was an English cricketer. He captained Sussex and England in the early 1960s. He played for the England international team. He was born in Milan, Italy. In June 2021, he was added into the ICC Cricket Hall of Fame. Dexter died on 25 August 2021 in Wolverhampton, England at the age of 86.Former England captain Ted Dexter dies aged 86 ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2021 deaths Category:English and Welsh cricketers Category:Sportspeople from Milan
title: Ted Dexter
